name: shallow chocolate
description: The chocolate isn't too deep here.  With a watertight container, you could gather fresh chocolate milk from here.  Not safe to drink as is.

name: deep chocolate
description: The chocolate isn't too deep here.  With a watertight container, you could gather fresh chocolate milk from here.  Not safe to drink as is.

name: caramel
description: An extremely hot, glowing liquid, composed of molten caramel.  In some places, caramel coated fruit is a delicacy.
